duration_raw: until the next time you make your daily preparations.
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 7" pfs="Standard">[Energy Aegis](/Spells.aspx?ID=100)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 335 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Spell Lists**
[Elemental](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=5)

**Bloodlines**
[Elemental](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=6), [Genie](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=11)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>

<row>1 minute ([material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284))</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** until the next time you make your daily preparations.
</row>

</column>

---

You protect the target with a powerful, long-lasting energy barrier. The target gains resistance 5 to acid, cold, electricity, fire, force, negative, positive, and sonic damage.

---
**Heightened (9th)** The resistances increase to 10.
name: Energy Aegis

summary_markdown: A creature gains resistance to acid, cold, electricity, fire, force, and sonic.
text: Energy Aegis Source Core Rulebook pg. 335 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Divine, Occult, Primal Spell Lists Elemental Bloodlines Elemental, Genie Cast 1 minute (material, somatic, verbal) Range touch Target 1 creature Duration until the next time you make your daily preparations. --- You protect the target with a powerful, long-lasting energy barrier. The target gains resistance 5 to acid, cold, electricity, fire, force, negative, positive, and sonic damage. --- Heightened (9th) The resistances increase to 10.
